title: 1X Technologies
description: 1X is a leader in humanoid robotics, creating general-purpose robots for the home as a first step in solving physical intelligence. With a focus on safety, 1X is at the forefront of the next wave of robotics, delivering products that are accessible and practical for consumers' households. 1Xâ€™s mission is to create an abundance of labor through safe, intelligent humanoids that work alongside people.
